name: Ninja Sneaking VS
description:
Important: This game requires at least 2 players.
You can play online by using Remote play together.

Asymmetrical competitive action game.

The intruder player aims for the goal at the right end of the screen in each stage.
Points are awarded in the order in which they reach the goal.
The player with the most points at the end of a given stage wins.

One of the players turns to the enemy side to interfere with clearing the stage.
One of the players takes turns to be the tracker for each stage. The player sets traps & manipulates enemy ninjas to prevent them from interfering with the player.


The number of traps in a stage changes depending on the difficulty level.
The number of traps is 30. The number of traps changes for each stage.
You can enjoy different combinations each time!
